title: Clues to brain differences between males and females

title_detail.value: Clues to brain differences between males and females

summary: Researchers have discovered a mechanism for how androgens -- male sex steroids -- sculpt brain development. The research could ultimately help researchers understand behavioral development differences between males and females.

summary_detail.value: Researchers have discovered a mechanism for how androgens -- male sex steroids -- sculpt brain development. The research could ultimately help researchers understand behavioral development differences between males and females.
